oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sylvester Nelson Winchester's Wooden Fife with Silver Metal Tips
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Private Sylvester Nelson Winchester enlisted as a musician on October 4 1861 at the age of 52. He was killed in action at the battle of Stones River on December 31, 1862 and is buried in the Stone River Civil War Monument.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Musical instruments
Making Music
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Images reproduced on this website are intended for individual, educational use only. For research inquiries about specific objects or requests for high resolution images, contact the Stones River National Battlefield.
